arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this Studio Lifecycle Config.

studioLifecycleConfigAppType.description: The App type that the Lifecycle Configuration is attached to. Valid values are `JupyterServer` and `KernelGateway`.

studioLifecycleConfigContent.description: The content of your Studio Lifecycle Configuration script. This content must be base64 encoded.

studioLifecycleConfigName.description: The name of the Studio Lifecycle Configuration to create.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
